Package dat.backend.model.persistence

Class OrderFacade

java.lang.Object
dat.backend.model.persistence.OrderFacade
public class OrderFacade extends Object
This class is a facade for OrderMapper.java. For the sake of simplicity and making the class easier to read. Every method in this class is static, and an instance of this class is never needed.
Author:
MrJustMeDahl
